title: Schema for an entry in the Open Contracting Extension Registry
description: Schema for an entry.json file pointing to the location of the extension.

category.title: Category
category.description: Part of the docs the extensions appears in.

core.title: Core extension
core.description: Whether the extension is a core extension documented in the main docs.

version.title: Version
version.description: Version of the extension. This may be completely separate from the version of the OCDS standard this extension is compatible with (use compatibility for that case).

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Applies to core extensions only. It declares where the extension documentation lives in the standard docs, i.e.  a `location` slug means the relevant information will be at http://standard.open-contracting.org/*version*/*lang*/extensions/location.

url.title: Extension URL
url.description: Location of extension.json file, typically within a github repository containing the extending schema files
